    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_108961</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_108961</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Nodes and antinodes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Knotenpunkte und Antinodes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Noeuds et ventres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nós e antinodes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vertici ed antinodes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κόμβοι και κοιλιές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nodos y antinodes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the nodes and antinodes of a sinusoidal wave formed from the interference of a wave generated by a transmitter and its reflected wave.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">antinodes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coherence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interference</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nodes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sinusoidal waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">transmitted</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wave reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Knotenpunkte und die 
Antinodes einer sinusförmigen Welle, die von der Störung einer Welle
gebildet wird, die durch einen Übermittler und seine reflektierte 
Welle festgelegt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les noeuds et les 
ventres d'une vague sinusoïdale formée de l'interférence d'une 
vague produite par un émetteur et sa vague reflétée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os nós e os antinodes de
uma onda sinusoidal dada forma da interferência de uma onda gerada 
por um transmissor e por sua onda refletida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i vertici ed i 
antinodes di un'onda sinusoidale formata dall'interferenza di un'onda 
generata da un trasmettitore e dalla relativa onda riflessa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τους κόμβους και κοιλιές 
ενός ημιτονοειδούς κύματος που διαμορφώνεται από την παρέμβαση 
ενός κύματος που παράγεται από μια συσκευή αποστολής σημάτων 
και το απεικονισμένο κύμα της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los nodos y los 
antinodes de una onda sinusoidal formada de la interferencia de una 
onda generada por un transmisor y su onda reflejada.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
